text: @piersmorgan @BorisJohnson How can anyone recover from this awful COVID19. I doubt very much trying to run a nation gives you any peace, quiet & substantial time to rest!! Awful situation. I wish Boris a full recovery. He has made a gallant effort in trying to continue. Thank you @BorisJohnson
